title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 13
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 13:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Alpert - The Age of Oversupply; Overcoming the Greatest Challenge to the Global Economy (2013)

-  Amin - Capitalism in the Age of Globalization; the Management of Contemporary Society (2014)

-  Andreb & Lohmann (Eds.) - The Working Poor in Europe; Employment, Poverty and Globalization (2008)

-  Arnold - The Mirage of Global Markets; How Globalizing Companies Can Succeed as Markets Localize (2004)

-  Barber et al (Eds.) - Confronting Capital; Critique and Engagement in Anthropology (2012)

-  Beder - Global Spin; the Corporate Assault on Environmentalism (2002)

-  Blossfeld et al (Eds.) - Globalization, Uncertainty and Youth in Society (2005)

-  Braudel - Afterthoughts on Material Civilization and Capitalism

-  Desai - Geopolitical Economy; After US Hegemony, Globalization and Empire (2013)

-  Dine & Fagan (Eds.) - Human Rights and Capitalism; a Multidisciplinary Perspective on Globalisation (2006)

-  Emigh - The Undevelopment of Capitalism; Sectors and Markets in 15th Century Tuscany (2008)

-  Farmer - Pathologies of Power; Health, Human Rights, and the New War on the Poor (2003)

-  Fuchs - OccupyMedia! The Occupy Movement and Social Media in Crisis Capitalism (2014)

-  Gaventa & Tandon (Eds.) - Globalizing Citizens; New Dynamics of Inclusion and Exclusion (2010)

-  Gustafson - Capitalism Russian-Style (1999)

-  Hilary - The Poverty of Capitalism; Economic Meltdown and the Struggle for What Comes Next (2013)

-  Johnston - The Fine Print; How Big Companies Use 'Plain English' to Rob You Blind (2013)

-  Jones - The Establishment and How They Get Away with It (2014)

-  Klaus - Forging Capitalism; Rogues, Swindlers, Frauds and the Rise of Modern France (2014)

-  Kley - The Taxation of Capitalistic Bequests (2012)

-  Lambert - Energy Companies and Market Reform; How Deregulation Went Wrong (2006)

-  Lanz (Ed.) - Beyond Capitalism & Socialism; a New Statement of an Old Ideal (2008)

-  Madrick - Seven Bad Ideas; How Mainstream Economists Have Damaged America and the World (2014)

-  Mander - The Capitalism Papers; Fatal Flaws of an Obsolete System (2012)

-  Mattera - Crapitalism; Liberals Who Make Millions Swiping Your Tax Dollars (2014)

-  McNamara (Ed.) - Corporatism and Korean Capitalism (1999)

-  Noys - Malign Velocities; Accelerationism and Capitalism (2014)

-  Perelman -The Invisible Handcuffs of Capitalism; How Market Tyranny Stifles the Economy by Stunting Workers (2011)

-  Rampton & Stauber - Trust Us, We're Experts! How Industry Manipulates Science and Gambles with Your Future (2001)

-  Rogers - Capitalism and Its Alternatives (2014)

-  Russi - Hungry Capital; the Financialization of Food (2013)

-  Screpanti - Global Imperialism and the Great Crisis; the Uncertain Future of Capitalism (2014)

-  Sloterdijk - In the World Interior of Capital; for a Philosophical Theory of Globalization (2013)

-  Tormey - Anti-Capitalism (2013)

-  Williams - Ecology and Socialism; Solutions to Capitalist Ecological Crisis (2010)
